name: Prince
desc: Prince is Margaret's cat and is also a Genius Invokation TCG Master at the Cat's Tail Tavern.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow." "You will be acknowledged as an Advanced player if you clear this challenge. Allow me, then, to deal on behalf of Prince. Let us begin!"
<color=#ccbfad>Complete Ascension Challenges to keep increasing your Player Level and unlock more rewards</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Starting Lineup:</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Reserve Lineup:</color>

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Advanced Player Badge
customize.desc:
Those who play Genius Invokation TCG often and complete the Advanced Player Trial match will obtain this Player Badge.

Many are those who become players, but the vast majority treat the game as a sort of pastime, and so those who become Advanced Players are few and far between.

Even games do provide the dedicated with unique rewards.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow..." "Now that's unexpected. You've really risen through the ranks, haven't you? Come then. Complete this challenge and take your place as an Expert player!"
<color=#ccbfad>Complete Ascension Challenges to keep increasing your Player Level and unlock more rewards</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Expert Player Badge
customize.desc:
Those who study the art of playing Genius Invokation TCG and clear the Expert Player Trial match will obtain this Player Badge.

Perhaps your attitude at this point is markedly different from when you first began, but you still find new joy in playing—
In willingly putting time into something you find interesting, and in enjoying all that comprises that which you love.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow..." "Interesting, very interesting indeed. I never would have thought that the beginner from back then would already be a challenger for the rank of Master."
<color=#ccbfad>Complete Ascension Challenges to keep increasing your Player Level and unlock more rewards</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Master Player Badge
customize.desc:
Those who reach the level at which they may complete the Master player Trial shall receive this Player Badge.

They say that few are the players who can obtain this badge, and each of them has their own unique take on the game.

Victory, it seems, may no longer be the sole object here.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow?" "Are you sure you want to take the challenge to be a Legend-rank player? This will be your toughest test yet, since the final trial requires you to vanquish all the tough opponents that you've challenged before and claim ultimate victory..."
<color=#ccbfad>Complete Ascension Challenges to keep increasing your Player Level and unlock more rewards</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Lineup 1:</color>

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Legend Player Badge
customize.desc:
Those who clear the Legend Player Trial will obtain this Player Badge.

This badge proves that you are well on your way to carving out your own unique mythos as a player.

Go forth, go beyond, and reach new heights!

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Magic Guide
customize.desc:
Bane of Storm and Tide: Magic Guide

The 12th edition of the Magic Guide.

It contains a great detail of errata, but nonetheless remains the most authoritative guide to magic in existence.

customize.name: Raven Bow
customize.desc:
Bane of Flame and Water: Raven Bow

Ravens are known to be the ferrymen of the dead. As such, hunters would decorate their bows' limbs with feathers which forebode the imminent death of their targets.

customize.name: White Iron Greatsword
customize.desc:
Mourning Silver Snow: White Iron Greatsword

A lightweight greatsword made of white iron with a silver sheen.

customize.name: White Tassel
customize.desc:
Ardent Argent: White Tassel

A standard-issue weapon of the Millelith soldiers. It has a sturdy shaft and sharp spearhead. It's a reliable weapon.

customize.name: Traveler's Handy Sword
customize.desc:
Traveler's Companion: Traveler's Handy Sword

A handy steel sword that contains all manner of useful items in its sheath.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Sacrificial Fragments
customize.desc:
Composed: Sacrificial Fragments

A weathered musical score, the content of which is no longer legible.

customize.name: Fruit of Fulfillment
customize.desc:
Moon's Fullness: Fruit of Fulfillment

"Even the most bitter of stories contain courage and strength... The story of the good Golden Nara's adventures with us will help good Nara defend the forest."

customize.name: Sacrificial Bow
customize.desc:
Composed: Sacrificial Bow

A ceremonial hunting bow that has seen the passage of many years. The trinkets on it are still visible.

customize.name: Sacrificial Greatsword
customize.desc:
Composed: Sacrificial Greatsword

This greatsword has seen the passage of many years, and was once owned by a clan of brave and gifted warriors who fought hard and died young.

customize.name: The Bell
customize.desc:
Rebellious Guardian: The Bell

There once was a traitor who brandished a blade against his fallen clan.

Though this individual was eventually cast out from his clan, rumor has that his organization continued their chosen duties.

Legend claims that even the Wolf Pup Rostam might have been involved...

customize.name: Lithic Spear
customize.desc:
Evil Shall Never Prevail: Lithic Spear

These spears were forged from the rocks of the Guyun Stone Forest, and were favored by the Millelith of old. Their hardness knows no equal.

customize.name: Sacrificial Sword
customize.desc:
Composed: Sacrificial Sword

This blade was just a prop before its blade was sharpened by the passage of time.

customize.name: Favonius Sword
customize.desc:
Windfall: Favonius Sword

"Legend has it that the knight that bore the title of Wolf Pup could cleave even raindrops with his blade, and the gates spurred by his blows were strong enough to snap roses.
Though none could match the heights of the Wolf Pup's prowess, the knights bear his oath of protection yet, his legacy lasting even to the present."

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Skyward Atlas
customize.desc:
Cloud Atlas: Skyward Atlas

Its full name is the "An atlas of the winds and clouds.”

This text records the winds and clouds of the northern lands' skies in poetic and archival forms.

customize.name: A Thousand Floating Dreams
customize.desc:
A Thousand Nights' Dawnsong: A Thousand Floating Dreams

"There is an appointed time for all things to live and die, just like the ceaseless cycles of night and dawn."

"May the stories within this lamp grant you dreams worth looking forward to."

customize.name: Skyward Harp
customize.desc:
Echoing Ballad: Skyward Harp

The sound of this sky-piercing lyre firing is music to the Anemo Archon's ears.

customize.name: Amos' Bow
customize.desc:
Strong-Willed: Amos' Bow

"I dreamt of ocean waves and sand, of lush forests and land."

"I dreamt of boars playing in berry bushes, of a towering spire."

customize.name: Elegy for the End
customize.desc:
The Parting Refrain: Elegy for the End

"...But no wind in any season on earth"

"Shall have you gaze upon me again."

customize.name: Wolf's Gravestone
customize.desc:
Mountain Trail: Wolf's Gravestone

A longsword said to have been used by the knight of the north wind. It became endowed with legendary power owing to his friendship with the wolves.

customize.name: Skyward Pride
customize.desc:
Sky-Rippin: Skyward Pride

This is a tale of sky-shaking valor. Bearing the will to defend all, let the wind dragon bestow wrath upon its vile nemesis.

customize.name: Skyward Spine
customize.desc:
Carving Black Wings: Skyward Spine

A spear that can hold up the skies. It was this unshakable resolve that sustained the wind dragon through its mortal battle against its vile nemesis.

customize.name: Vortex Vanquisher
customize.desc:
Golden Majesty: Vortex Vanquisher

Folklore spoke of a vast shadow entrenched in the depths of the ocean capable of swallowing passing warships...

At tale's end, they believe that Rex Lapis once wielded a spear that pierced the rainbow, pinning the churning vortex that had once terrorized the oceans in the center of the deep sea.

customize.name: Engulfing Lightning
customize.desc:
Timeless Dream: Engulfing Lightning

The naginata was a lethal weapon by which scattered dross might be cut away.

And the one who wielded that naginata was one who guarded the path to eternity.

customize.name: Aquila Favonia
customize.desc:
Let the Wind Lead: Aquila Favonia

This sword was ever at the hip of the warrior from another land, and it bore witness to her achievement in spreading justice and freedom across Mondstadt.

customize.name: Skyward Blade
customize.desc:
Sky-Piercing: Skyward Blade

The sky-piercing fang. With nemesis vanquished, the wind dragon fell into a deep slumber.

Centuries passed, and Dvalin's sacrifice was all but forgotten by Mondstadt.

A prayer, this sword is. May Dvalin's name be restored.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Chinju Forest
customize.desc:
Abode of Dwelling Demons

Legend has it that this sacred forest was once home to many demons.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. customize.name: Katheryne
customize.desc:
Katheryne, Guild Receptionist

"Ad astra abyssosque! Welcome to the Adventurers' Guild."

customize.name: Timaeus
customize.desc:
Timaeus, Scholar of Alchemy

"Hello there… Oh, you'd like to use the Crafting Bench? Sure, be my guest."

customize.name: Wagner
customize.desc:
Wagner, Blacksmith

"Smithing is not dependent on brute strength. You need the sweat on your brow from constant hard work, and perseverance stronger than the metals we forge!"

customize.name: Chef Mao
customize.desc:
Chef Mao, Ingenious Gourmet

"We just concern ourselves with making the most delicious food imaginable using everyday ingredients, universally loved flavors, and truly excellent cooking."

customize.name: Timmie
customize.desc:
"Pure Patience" Timmie

"Will pigeons that have flown away come back?"

customize.name: Ellin
customize.desc:
"Knightly Dream" Ellin

"I've got to hone my spirit and strength both if my sword arm is to be as steady as Master Jean's!"

customize.name: Iron Tongue Tian
customize.desc:
"Where We Last Left Off" Iron Tongue Tian

"Listen, I'll tell you how is it… Let me show you real storytelling tradition!”

customize.name: Liu Su
customize.desc:
"In the Next Volume" Liu Su

"Well then, dear guests, what would you all like to hear next?"

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Tubby
customize.desc:
"Rain Calmer" Tubby

"Steeping a pot of tea, watching over the abode, accompanying the Traveler and Paimon to await the arrival of Ping and the others, watching the cloud-filled sky. These days of not having to concern myself with matters of adeptal import truly are ones of leisure…"

"Oh! Oh dear, I must have fallen asleep again. It’s a good thing that no one noticed…"

customize.name: Liben
customize.desc:
"Marvelous Merchandise" Liben

Big things are about to happen, big things! Oh, and I have an excellent business proposition for you, so, if I could just have a moment of your time?

customize.name: Chang the Ninth
customize.desc:
Chang the Ninth, Listless Literati

"He who has not known poverty has yet to become a true man, and at least this man has books to keep him company!"

customize.name: Hanachirusato
customize.desc:
Persistence of Pain: Hanachirusato

"When shall we meet again after this parting? For life is like the morning dew."

customize.name: Kid Kujirai
customize.desc:
Temari-Hiding Intentions: Kid Kujirai

"When you hide a Temari, you have to hide it within the time of a Temari song. The person who is looking for it will also find it within a song's time. That will make the game fair!"

customize.name: Xudong
customize.desc:
Fulfillment First: Xudong

"Hmm? A problem. Agh. We can deal with it after we finish eating."

customize.name: Dunyarzad
customize.desc:
Purity of Trust: Dunyarzad

"The point of living is to not leave behind any regrets."

customize.name: Rana
customize.desc:
Gem of Remembrance: Rana

"We still have a lot of time with each other. We can explore the vastness of the forest, the world, and the future together."

customize.name: Master Zhang
customize.desc:
Arsenal Forge: Master Zhang

Much burning frustration must transpire before a hunk of metal may become a keen blade.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Parametric Transformer
customize.desc:
Perpetual Rotation: Parametric Transformation

"Simply put, everything on this earth and below it has cycles. Memories and elements surge throughout the Ley Lines."

"Perhaps the ancient civilizations were attempting to uncover the cycle that governs the conversion of dust to treasure."

customize.name: NRE
customize.desc:
Emergency Intake: Portable Dish

"Regular nutrition helps in case of physical exertion."

customize.name: Red Feather Fan
customize.desc:
Ineffable Breeze: Red Feather Fan

Legend has it that this fan is capable of unleashing various effects in the hands of a tengu warrior.

But in the hands of an ordinary person, it only possesses the power to "make one's body lighter."

Even so, this degree of power is more than useful for the average individual.

customize.name: Treasure-Seeking Seelie
customize.desc:
Revelation's Potential: Treasure-Seeking Seelie

Strange Seelie capable of guiding people toward treasure. Legend has it that some individuals know how to communicate with these Seelie...

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: The Legend of Vennessa
customize.desc:
Dream of Freedom Unrelinquished

"Lonely forest breezes converged, jointly they overthrew the tyrant's tower from the sky."

"Broken free from shackles at last, the young lioness stood firm in the winds with her head held high."

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Sweet Madame
customize.desc:
Sweet Madame

Perhaps some have never seen a chicken run… But there's no one who hasn't tried a Sweet Madame!

customize.name: Minty Meat Rolls
customize.desc:
Minty Meat Rolls

Though this might be its current form, think about it for a moment: did this dish first start as mint rolled around meat, or meat rolled around mint?

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Jueyun Guoba
customize.desc:
Jueyun Guoba

Flavorful and crispy Jueyun Guoba — with Guoba's stamp of approval.

customize.name: Adeptus' Temptation
customize.desc:
Adeptus' Temptation

It is said that this name was derived from this dish's ability to tempt an adeptus to return to the mortal realm. But that begs the question… Which adeptus was that?

customize.name: Lotus Flower Crisp
customize.desc:
Lotus Flower Crisp

Dough is formed into bud-like shapes and placed into a pot of oil as if upon the surface of a lake, causing them to slowly bloom layer by layer… A pleasing sight indeed.

customize.name: Northern Smoked Chicken
customize.desc:
Northern Smoked Chicken

This dish makes for a warm welcome for guests who come to the northern regions. Now, what manner of guests shall be "treated" to this hospitality this time?

customize.name: Mushroom Pizza
customize.desc:
Mushroom Pizza

They say that a researcher once used very precise calculations to uncover the "fairest way to cut pizza," but as the process is far too bothersome, basically no one uses it…

customize.name: Teyvat Fried Egg
customize.desc:
Teyvat Fried Egg

With a taste of the summer sun, it invigorates you from the first bite.

Take care to eat this meal slowly, and avoid choking the throat of destiny when impelled by the fullness of life's vitality.

customize.name: Sashimi Platter
customize.desc:
Sashimi Platter

Under the blade of a master chef, the texture of the ingredients remains pristine. Upon consumption, it is as if something living is leaping inside your mouth...

Hold on, could these ingredients still be...

customize.name: Tandoori Roast Chicken
customize.desc:
Tandoori Roast Chicken

The chicken and spices are capable of performing a mysterious Sumeru dance on the tip of your tongue, evoking the image of a festive banquet...

But even a dish so delicious has its last bite, and every feast has its end.

customize.name: Butter Crab
customize.desc:
Butter Crab

The butter-infused crab legs have a rich aroma that washes over the taste buds so seductively that none can resist its allure.

"Another helping, please!"

customize.name: Match Invitation Letter
customize.desc: You can select a player from the Player List via the invitation board, and then entrust The Cat's Tail to send out an invitation using this Invitation Letter. The invited player will head over to the tavern and wait for a duel with you.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.name: Crystal Chunk
customize.desc: An uncut crystal. Only professional craftsmanship can bring out its true value.

customize.name: Magical Crystal Chunk
customize.desc:
These crystal chunks can be refined into Weapon EXP materials by using Original Resin.
Crystals from mines that were eroded by the energy of the Ley Lines cannot be processed by ordinary means.

customize.name: Amethyst Lump
customize.desc: An uncut crystal that can only be found in Inazuma. Some professional craftsmanship will bring out its true value.

customize.name: Flaming Flower Stamen
customize.desc: The stamen of a fiercely burning flower. Even after being extinguished, it still emits heat.

customize.name: Mist Flower Corolla
customize.desc: A flower bud encased in solid ice. Even after being picked, the flower continues to emit cold.

customize.name: Electro Crystal
customize.desc: A power-rich crystal that draws electricity from the air around it. Holding it makes your hand a little numb.

customize.name: Dandelion Seed
customize.desc: A tiny seed that rides on the wind. Even without its feathered wings, it still holds the hope from afar within.

customize.name: Cecilia
customize.desc: A beautiful flower with a name that suits its appearance. It only grows where harsh winds blow, and is just as intangible as the true heart of an unbound soul.

customize.name: Glaze Lily
customize.desc: An extremely ancient flower that was said to be commonly seen in Liyue. It transforms the memories of the land into its fragrance during florescence.

customize.name: Dendrobium
customize.desc: A vibrant plant that has also been named the "lycoris" by the poets. It was once thought extinct in the Inazuman archipelago, only to re-emerge now upon the battlefields. It is said that it blooms most enchantingly where much blood was spilled.

customize.name: Silver Raven Insignia
customize.desc: A raven insignia used by members of the Treasure Hoarders to identify each other. The Treasure Hoarders ask for no resume. Anyone who has an insatiable desire for treasure and is backed up by an equal amount of courage can become a worthy member.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.desc:
"Plenilune Gaze" Ganyu

"This press release is due tomorrow… I suppose I could work through the night and get it done.”

customize.name: Diona
customize.desc:

1% energy dedicated to mixing drinks, 99% to... denying the reality of familiar.

customize.name: Kaeya

customize.name: Chongyun
customize.desc:

customize.desc:

customize.desc:

customize.desc:

customize.name: Venti
customize.desc:

"Of course, to look at it differently, I am the one who should be credited here, and not they."

Credits should be given where credits belong — if not for the bard who pens the song, then who shall ensure that these tales are passed on!?"
